= name =

== Syntax ==
 field: '''.name''' (Read-only)

== Description ==
The '''name''' field returns the primary name or identifier of various unit types. This field provides access to the name/identifier of units, extra descriptions, commands, and zones, allowing DIL programs to identify and reference different entities by their names.

== Field Access ==
{| class="wikitable"
! Access !! Type !! Description
|-
| Read || string || Returns the primary name/identifier of the unit
|}

== Availability ==
This field is available on the following unit types:
* UNIT_ST_PC (Player Character)
* UNIT_ST_NPC (Non-Player Character)
* UNIT_ST_OBJ (Object)
* UNIT_ST_ROOM (Room)
* cmdptr (Command pointer)
* extraptr (Extra description pointer)
* zoneptr (Zone pointer)

== Examples ==
 dilbegin cuff_target(deputy : unitptr, targ : unitptr, cuffs : unitptr);
 var
    depname : string;
 code
 {
    act("You cuff $3n.", A_SOMEONE, deputy, null, targ, TO_CHAR);
    act("$1n surprises you and put $2n around your wrists.", A_SOMEONE, deputy, cuffs, targ, TO_VICT);
    act("$1n puts $2n around $3N's wrists.", A_SOMEONE, deputy, cuffs, targ, TO_NOTVICT);

    follow(targ, deputy);
    depname := deputy.name;
    link(cuffs, targ);
    unequip(equipment(targ, WEAR_WRIST_R));
    addequip(cuffs, WEAR_WRIST_R);
    dilcopy("cuffed@midgaard("+depname+")", targ);
    dilcopy("cuffed2@midgaard("+depname+")", targ);

    exec("sigh", targ);
    return;
 } dilend

 dilbegin identify_item(item : unitptr);
 var
    item_name : string;
 code
 {
    if (item.type != UNIT_ST_OBJ)
    {
       exec("say That's not an object!", self);
       return;
    }
    
    item_name := item.name;
    exec("say This is called: " + item_name, self);
    
    // Check if it has special names
    if (length(item.names) > 1)
    {
       exec("say It's also known as: " + item.names.[1], self);
    }
 } dilend

 dilbegin command_info(cmd : cmdptr);
 var
    cmd_name : string;
 code
 {
    cmd_name := cmd.name;
    exec("say This command is: " + cmd_name, self);
 } dilend

 dilbegin zone_details(zone : zoneptr);
 var
    zone_name : string;
 code
 {
    zone_name := zone.name;
    exec("say Current zone: " + zone_name, self);
 } dilend

 dilbegin extra_description_check(extra : extraptr);
 var
    extra_name : string;
 code
 {
    extra_name := extra.name;
    exec("say This extra is called: " + extra_name, self);
    
    // Check for additional names
    if (length(extra.names) > 1)
    {
       exec("say Also known as: " + extra.names.[1], self);
    }
 } dilend

== Usage Notes ==
* The '''name''' field is read-only and cannot be modified
* Returns different types of names depending on the unit type:
** For units (PC/NPC/Obj/Room): Returns the primary name from the names list
** For extra descriptions: Returns the primary name from the extra's names list
** For commands: Returns the command string
** For zones: Returns the zone name
* For units with multiple names, use the '''names''' field to access all names
* The primary name is typically the first name in the names list

== Error Handling ==
* Returns '''fail''' if the unit pointer is null or invalid
* Returns '''error''' if accessed on an unsupported type
* Always check if the unit is valid before accessing the name field
